name: Documentation Header Component
description:
Keep track of your work with a simple but powerful component.


Use the Documentation Header to add context to your mock-up, describe a workflow, or annotate your work.


Built to last

This file was designed to serve as a durable component that can be easily remixed, published, and dropped into any file.


Colors have been hand-picked to look great on light or dark backgrounds; and you can just as easily toggle between a dark or light mode when editing.


Built to be flexible

This component can be adjusted to your liking. Choose from a robust list of popular ticket repositories or add your own. Same goes for statuses. The essentials are there, but you can also customize it fit your workflow.


Built to stay "fixed"

Typing a lot of documentation can stretch the text layer out, making it hard to read. This is solved by toggling between 'fixed ‚î†‚î®' and 'flexible ‚Üî' widths. The component can still be resized, but your text will stay in place and remain legible.
